rules.title: Classified Information
rules.reason: Classified national defense or foreign policy information
rules.full_text: This section does not apply to matters that are (A) specifically authorized under criteria established by an Executive order to be kept secret in the interest of national defense or foreign policy and (B) are in fact properly classified pursuant to such Executive order.

rules.title: Internal Rules
rules.reason: Internal agency personnel rules and practices
rules.full_text: This section does not apply to matters that are related solely to the internal personnel rules and practices of an agency.

rules.title: Statutory Exemption
rules.reason: Information exempted by other federal statute
rules.full_text: This section does not apply to matters that are specifically exempted from disclosure by statute (other than section 552b of this title), if that statute (A)(i) requires that the matters be withheld from the public in such a manner as to leave no discretion on the issue; or (ii) establishes particular criteria for withholding or refers to particular types of matters to be withheld; and (B) if enacted after the date of enactment of the OPEN FOIA Act of 2009, specifically cites to this paragraph.

rules.title: Trade Secrets
rules.reason: Trade secrets and confidential commercial or financial information
rules.full_text: This section does not apply to matters that are trade secrets and commercial or financial information obtained from a person and privileged or confidential.

rules.title: Deliberative Process
rules.reason: Deliberative process privilege, attorney-client privilege, or attorney work product
rules.full_text: This section does not apply to matters that are inter-agency or intra-agency memorandums or letters that would not be available by law to a party other than an agency in litigation with the agency, provided that the deliberative process privilege shall not apply to records created 25 years or more before the date on which the records were requested.

rules.title: Personal Privacy
rules.full_text: This section does not apply to matters that are personnel and medical files and similar files the disclosure of which would constitute a clearly unwarranted invasion of personal privacy.

rules.title: Interference with Proceedings
rules.full_text: This section does not apply to records or information compiled for law enforcement purposes, but only to the extent that the production of such law enforcement records or information could reasonably be expected to interfere with enforcement proceedings.

rules.title: Fair Trial
rules.reason: Deprivation of right to fair trial or impartial adjudication
rules.full_text: This section does not apply to records or information compiled for law enforcement purposes, but only to the extent that the production of such law enforcement records or information would deprive a person of a right to a fair trial or an impartial adjudication.

rules.title: Personal Privacy
rules.reason: Unwarranted invasion of personal privacy in law enforcement context
rules.full_text: This section does not apply to records or information compiled for law enforcement purposes, but only to the extent that the production of such law enforcement records or information could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy.

rules.title: Confidential Source
rules.full_text: This section does not apply to records or information compiled for law enforcement purposes, but only to the extent that the production of such law enforcement records or information could reasonably be expected to disclose the identity of a confidential source, including a State, local, or foreign agency or authority or any private institution which furnished information on a confidential basis, and, in the case of a record or information compiled by criminal law enforcement authority in the course of a criminal investigation or by an agency conducting a lawful national security intelligence investigation, information furnished by a confidential source.

rules.title: Techniques and Procedures
rules.reason: Disclosure of law enforcement techniques, procedures, or guidelines
rules.full_text: This section does not apply to records or information compiled for law enforcement purposes, but only to the extent that the production of such law enforcement records or information would disclose techniques and procedures for law enforcement investigations or prosecutions, or would disclose guidelines for law enforcement investigations or prosecutions if such disclosure could reasonably be expected to risk circumvention of the law.

rules.title: Physical Safety
rules.reason: Endangerment of life or physical safety
rules.full_text: This section does not apply to records or information compiled for law enforcement purposes, but only to the extent that the production of such law enforcement records or information could reasonably be expected to endanger the life or physical safety of any individual.

rules.title: Financial Institutions
rules.reason: Information related to supervision of financial institutions
rules.full_text: This section does not apply to matters that are contained in or related to examination, operating, or condition reports prepared by, on behalf of, or for the use of an agency responsible for the regulation or supervision of financial institutions.

rules.title: Geological Information
rules.reason: Geological and geophysical information concerning wells
rules.full_text: This section does not apply to matters that are geological and geophysical information and data, including maps, concerning wells.
